general.name: wisconsin_pca_plate
general.description: This file contains the output of the Wisconsin PCA computation of the BOSS galaxy product, according to the algorithm documentation:http://www.sdss.org/dr13/spectro/galaxy_wisconsin for each PLATE-MJD.
general.naming_convention: wisconsin_pca-pppp-mmmmm.fits, where pppp is a 4-digit plate number, and mmmmm is a 5-digit MJD.

changelog.description: Describes changes to the datamodel product and/or file structure from one release to another
